> 20 hours ago, KerBlitz Kerman said:
> 
> 
> Can you make this use the stock texture switcher implemented recently? Or is firespitter superior?
> 

The stock version is much nicer but it'd involve redoing all the colors, and relearning the system. Might get to it but it would be a while. Currently my main thought is "if it ain't broke don't fix it" ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

A part or mechanic that upsets game balance by being too powerful.">OP</abbr>. Currently <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> has MIT, so if you decide to go with CC-BY-NC-4.0, we'll need to update that as well.
